results.title: Racial and ethnic differences in response to treatment for Marfan syndrome.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: For @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@aortic root enlargement@@@ by z score amongst non-Hispanic White @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ exhibited an annual z score change of -0.090 +- 0.016, compared to -0.146 +- 0.015 for those on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (p = 0.01), favouring @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Ayers R, Kelleman M, Iannucci G, McCracken C, Oster ME. Racial and ethnic differences in response to treatment for Marfan syndrome. Cardiol Young. 2021 Dec;31(12):1991-1998. PMID: 33845931

results.title: Recruitment, retention, and adherence in a clinical trial: The Pediatric Heart Network's Marfan Trial experience.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND/AIMS: The Pediatric Heart Network @DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan@@@ Trial was a randomized trial comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@aortic root dilation@@@ in 608 children and young adults with @DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan syndrome@@@.

results.title: Predictors of Rapid Aortic Root Dilation and Referral for Aortic Surgery in Marfan Syndrome.
results.text_hl: To identify independent predictors of the rate of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@aortic root (@@@@<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@AoR) dilation@@@ and referral for aortic surgery, we investigated the data from the Pediatric Heart Network randomized trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ in young @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@MFS@@@.

results.title: Losartan added to beta-blockade therapy for aortic root dilation in Marfan syndrome: a randomized, open-label pilot study.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@PATIENTS@@@ AND METHODS: Between May 1, 2007, and September 31, 2011, 28 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@MFS@@@ (11 males [39%]; mean +- SD age, 13.1+-6.3 years) with recognized @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@aortic root dilation@@@ (z score >2.0) and receiving BB (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@) treatment were enrolled.

citations.NLM: Chiu HH, Wu MH, Wang JK, Lu CW, Chiu SN, Chen CA, Lin MT, Hu FC. Losartan added to beta-blockade therapy for aortic root dilation in Marfan syndrome: a randomized, open-label pilot study. Mayo Clin Proc. 2013 Mar;88(3):271-6. PMID: 23321647
